short_summary: Concrete Stair and Sidewalk Restoration, Railing Replacement Phase 1
description: The repair and restoration of  concrete stairs and sidewalks and the replacement of railings at the Mission Medium Institution
duration_in_months: It ranges from July 31, 2024, to July 31, 2025.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Invitation to Qualify
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), on behalf of the Correctional Service of Canada, is issuing an Invitation to Qualify for the repair and restoration of concrete stairs and sidewalks, and the replacement of railings at the Mission Medium Institution in Mission, British Columbia.

### Project Overview

The project involves the repair and restoration of concrete stairs and sidewalks, and the replacement of railings at the Mission Medium Institution. This is the first phase of a two-phase process, where the qualifications of all bidders will be evaluated.

### Tender Details
* **Tender Reference Number**: WS4551262004
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4551262004
* **Publication Date**: May 7, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 23, 2024, at 14:00:00 (PST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: July 31, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: July 31, 2025

### Procurement Category and Method
* **Procurement Category**: Construction Services (CNST)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

### Selection Criteria
* The lowest price will be the selection criteria in Phase 2.

### Trade Agreements
* The contract will be subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Regions of Opportunity
* None

### Regions of Delivery
* British Columbia

### Contracting Authority
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Contact Information
* Clara Dumay, Contracting Authority
* Email: clara.dumay@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Website: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19624757?extsite=MTk2MjQ3NTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19624757?extsite=MTk2MjQ3NTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
